title: Forceful Reckoning
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EbKQEk

by ButtonPusherExtraordinaire

Ranked a Commander because of his bloodline, and because he had destroyed the Death Star, Luke had thought that he was on his way to making his father proud, but Darth Vader changed that. How could the planet-killer be his father, the Hero With No Fear? And now, as he was in the Sith Lord’s grip, Luke realized that his father was right: there could be no escape; he needed help. AU!

Words: 6629, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Original Trilogy, Star Wars Legends - All Media Types
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Characters: Anakin Skywalker | Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker, Yoda (Star Wars), Obi-Wan Kenobi, Sheev Palpatine | Darth Sidious


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2EbKQEk

blog.title: AO3Feed-The Force Awakens
blog.description: Fan fiction for Star Wars: The Force Awakens

title: A Suitable Haunting
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Ee2ck1

by Gefionne

Dr. Armitage Hux is a criminal psychologist studying violent offenders, but he has an unusual talent: he can see the ghosts of the recently departed. When visiting a prison, he is confronted by the spirit of Kylo Ren. Usually spirits are quick to cross over, but somehow Kylo remains, attaching himself to Hux. As Hux helps solve a series of crimes, he and Kylo form a bond despite the barrier of life after death.

Words: 10519, Chapters: 1/7, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Armitage Hux, Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Phasma (Star Wars), Poe Dameron, Finn (Star Wars), Rey (Star Wars), Maz Kanata, Snoke (Star Wars)
  • Relationships: Armitage Hux/Kylo Ren, Armitage Hux/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Ghosts, Discussion of crime scenes, Murder Mystery, spectral astral projection sex, brief mentions of sexual assault (no one is assaulted), Kylo is a ghost but he’s around so it’s not really MCD


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Ee2ck1

tags: poe dameron is also a good friend
summary: Episode X: Divide & Conquer  Chapter 35 - Finally This story will be concluding this week! If you haven’t forced everyone you...
caption:
Episode X: Divide & Conquer 

Chapter 35 - Finally

This story will be concluding this week! If you haven’t forced everyone you know to read it, now would be a good time :) I am so grateful to my street team for spreading the word @thelittlemockingjayonfire @leofgyth @thefitfulfire @toawaterfowl @jesssssah @nancylovesreylo @thereylowritingden @reylofanficclub @thebitchesofdathomir @slytherintobed

“So, what, you’re just gonna roll up in the Falcon? Say, ‘Hi, I’m Rey, I’m here to pick up my kids?’” Rey paused in her scrambling and turned slowly to Poe, looking annoyed.

“No.” The friends stared each other down for a moment.

“Okay. Then what’re you gonna do?”

Rey looked to the window and scrunched her nose a little. “I hadn’t really figured that part out yet,” she said crossing her arms.

“Right, that’s what I’m saying, you need a plan. And help. Whoever this is, she took your kids in the blink of an eye. She managed to snag Kylo kriffing Ren, and the galaxy hasn’t imploded, so I’m assuming she’s got him under control, somehow. This is obviously not some small fry being, okay? I get that you can sense them now - good, that will be helpful - but you need a plan or else you might just end up trapped, too. And then what, Rey? Because we don’t have super powers; we won’t be able to just close our eyes and find you.”

Poe moved towards her slowly. “I know you’re in a hurry. Time is of the essence; every minute you’re here, you’re not on your way to them, I get that. Let us help you. If you don’t want some huge squadron going with you, fine. But you have no idea what you’re heading into, Rey, and trust me, that is not the kind of thing anyone should do alone,” Poe put his hands on her shoulders and squeezed, “Not even the galaxy’s resident badass Jedi gal Rey Solo,” he finished quietly, with a sparkle in his eye.
caption_abstract:
Episode X: Divide & Conquer 

Chapter 35 - Finally

This story will be concluding this week! If you haven’t forced everyone you know to read it, now would be a good time :) I am so grateful to my street team for spreading the word @thelittlemockingjayonfire @leofgyth @thefitfulfire @toawaterfowl @jesssssah @nancylovesreylo @thereylowritingden @reylofanficclub @thebitchesofdathomir @slytherintobed

“So, what, you’re just gonna roll up in the Falcon? Say, ‘Hi, I’m Rey, I’m here to pick up my kids?’” Rey paused in her scrambling and turned slowly to Poe, looking annoyed.

“No.” The friends stared each other down for a moment.

“Okay. Then what’re you gonna do?”

Rey looked to the window and scrunched her nose a little. “I hadn’t really figured that part out yet,” she said crossing her arms.

“Right, that’s what I’m saying, you need a plan. And help. Whoever this is, she took your kids in the blink of an eye. She managed to snag Kylo kriffing Ren, and the galaxy hasn’t imploded, so I’m assuming she’s got him under control, somehow. This is obviously not some small fry being, okay? I get that you can sense them now - good, that will be helpful - but you need a plan or else you might just end up trapped, too. And then what, Rey? Because we don’t have super powers; we won’t be able to just close our eyes and find you.”

Poe moved towards her slowly. “I know you’re in a hurry. Time is of the essence; every minute you’re here, you’re not on your way to them, I get that. Let us help you. If you don’t want some huge squadron going with you, fine. But you have no idea what you’re heading into, Rey, and trust me, that is not the kind of thing anyone should do alone,” Poe put his hands on her shoulders and squeezed, “Not even the galaxy’s resident badass Jedi gal Rey Solo,” he finished quietly, with a sparkle in his eye.

trail.content_raw:
Episode X: Divide & Conquer 

Chapter 35 - Finally

This story will be concluding this week! If you haven’t forced everyone you know to read it, now would be a good time :) I am so grateful to my street team for spreading the word @thelittlemockingjayonfire @leofgyth @thefitfulfire @toawaterfowl @jesssssah @nancylovesreylo @thereylowritingden @reylofanficclub @thebitchesofdathomir @slytherintobed

[[MORE]]

“So, what, you’re just gonna roll up in the Falcon? Say, ‘Hi, I’m Rey, I’m here to pick up my kids?’” Rey paused in her scrambling and turned slowly to Poe, looking annoyed.

“No.” The friends stared each other down for a moment.

“Okay. Then what’re you gonna do?”

Rey looked to the window and scrunched her nose a little. “I hadn’t really figured that part out yet,” she said crossing her arms.

“Right, that’s what I’m saying, you need a plan. And help. Whoever this is, she took your kids in the blink of an eye. She managed to snag Kylo kriffing Ren, and the galaxy hasn’t imploded, so I’m assuming she’s got him under control, somehow. This is obviously not some small fry being, okay? I get that you can sense them now - good, that will be helpful - but you need a plan or else you might just end up trapped, too. And then what, Rey? Because we don’t have super powers; we won’t be able to just close our eyes and find you.”

Poe moved towards her slowly. “I know you’re in a hurry. Time is of the essence; every minute you’re here, you’re not on your way to them, I get that. Let us help you. If you don’t want some huge squadron going with you, fine. But you have no idea what you’re heading into, Rey, and trust me, that is not the kind of thing anyone should do alone,” Poe put his hands on her shoulders and squeezed, “Not even the galaxy’s resident badass Jedi gal Rey Solo,” he finished quietly, with a sparkle in his eye.

She managed to snag Kylo kriffing Ren, and the galaxy hasn’t imploded, so I’m assuming she’s got him under control, somehow. This is obviously not some small fry being, okay? I get that you can sense them now - good, that will be helpful - but you need a plan or else you might just end up trapped, too. And then what, Rey? Because we don’t have super powers; we won’t be able to just close our eyes and find you.”

Poe moved towards her slowly. “I know you’re in a hurry. Time is of the essence; every minute you’re here, you’re not on your way to them, I get that. Let us help you. If you don’t want some huge squadron going with you, fine. But you have no idea what you’re heading into, Rey, and trust me, that is not the kind of thing anyone should do alone,” Poe put his hands on her shoulders and squeezed, “Not even the galaxy’s resident badass Jedi gal Rey Solo,” he finished quietly, with a sparkle in his eye.

blog.description:
This blog automatically posts links to AO3 fics containing the Rey/Kylo Ren tag.
Avatar by @panda-capuccino

title: Sirens
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2AV284w

by SageMcMae

When her kind frequented the oceans, mermaids spent hours polishing their scales and knotting their tresses with beads and shells to attract a mate. Rey can’t imagine such a tedious thing. She has no interest in a mate. Not that it matters since she is the last mermaid.

One morning she wakes up to find a small offering left outside her home. She catches only a glimpse of alabaster and obsidian before the creature dives into the murky depths of the deep sea. On the edge of the drop-off, Rey is left with a choice: Stay in the light or follow into the dark.

Words: 2450, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Rey (Star Wars), Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Ben Solo, Kylo Ren

blog.name: dingoat
blog.title: bork
blog.description: Hobby artist, wildlife enthusiast. I like to RP and draw shit, especially stuff involving what me and my partners in creative crime play out. Active on swtor (Star Forge; 'Ahuska' Impside and 'Ahuska Crow' Pubside) and ffxiv (Balmung; Ahuska Crow). Bothan Mandalorian, lost and scared Miqo'te Keeper. Don't be afraid to say hi!

tags: girl got herself a laser turret watch out
summary:
"Keep your head on the fethin' fight you old prick!" Nela screamed from the engine room.  

"Don't talk to your buir that way!!"...
caption:
“Keep your head on the fethin’ fight you old prick!” Nela screamed from the engine room.

“Don’t talk to your buir that way!!” Ahuska’s voice hollered back reflexively, actually managing a small laugh amid the blur of motion and firefight around her.

Her aim wasn’t terrible, but the situation unfamiliar and unpractised enough that most of her time during those first few sweeps was spent getting a feel for the speed and direction of the laser bolts; the need to anticipate the movement of the enemy ships, the way a fractional movement of the turret would cause a massive change in the trajectory of the blasts. 

“You know I’ve never done this before, right?” She shouted to Crow between shots, which were getting… slowly, but surely, increasingly under her control.

Crow cackled back at her, and responded in their traditional tongue. “<No better time to learn!>”

—

Aaaaahhhhh me an’ @humanrevolt are in the middle of some BIG THINGS be prepared for a disjointed onslaught of RP related doodles over the next little while there is so much going on hot damn and I don’t know how it’s gonna end
